title: @Meddler What issues are the 5.18 Zyra changes going to address?
body: Plant AI, her root, scaling, movement speed?

replies.body: We'll start by looking at plant AI, see what can be improved there. After that depends on how that investigation goes.

Oh,by the way,her basic attacks are a little bit ''off''.

could you check Into that?It would be great!

Thanks for being responsive and such.
Could you expand a bit on what you mean by "off" for me? It's a term different people use in different ways so I'd rather not make any assumptions.

Yes,sorry.

when I mean off, I was talking about the trajectory It takes,It goes a little too much to her right I believe.

not much more than a little annoyance,but It gets wonky  on a champion that relies a reasonable amount to AAing.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Y3NXtElX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-31T17:49:08.236+0000)
>
> We'll start by looking at plant AI, see what can be improved there. After that depends on how that investigation goes.

Excellent, that would go a long way. She'll be fine if only her plants didn't sometimes ignore enemies champions for no reason. An actual passive would help too.

**Plant AI:** Auto-target champions when they enter their range, add alt+rightclick for player to change their target

**Passive:** Give her passive a component that is relevant while she is still alive. Examples:
- Zyra's autoattacks gain +X for every Y ability power
- Zyra's autoattacks place a seed debuff on targets. Targets with seed debuff take extra damage from Zyra's plants
[Plant affinity themed]:
- Zyra gains +X ability power and movement speed for each active plant
- Zyra gains +X% ability power when in a bush
The plant AI fix would be huge, but please, PLEASE do not force her into the support role when her intended role is mid lane..she is my #1 mid laner and I don't want her to be shunned to the bot lane

I bet you can't make it better than fish AI.
